reviewText: Excellent coverage of all dangers our merchant mariners faced during WW2 including the prison camps. I sailed as a tanker engineer before, during and continued sailing after the war. This was a story that needed to be told.

For those who know little of the most overlooked branch of the services, this is a great video to provide the viewer with the significance of the contribution made by those brave men of the US Merchant Marines.

Great Suff on this DVD for guys like me who really did sail in our United States Merchant Marine. My problem for only 3 stars is that this DVD would not play on my DVD player,only on the computer...whats up with that?
